function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient readiness for waste and wastewater management in GBCSs","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases due to poor waste and wastewater management","Mitigation":"Implement modifications to improve adaptability to pandemic conditions, establish efficient waste and wastewater management practices","Technologies":"Advanced waste treatment technologies, smart waste management systems","People":"Inhabitants of the GBCSs, surrounding communities","Owner":"Local authorities, waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Undermined Indoor Environmental Quality (IEQ) in buildings","Impact":"Higher risk of occupants catching contagious diseases due to poor IEQ","Mitigation":"Establish pragmatic guidelines for reducing health risks in buildings, adopt an interdisciplinary approach to building design","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, advanced ventilation systems","People":"Occupants, facility managers, designers","Owner":"Building owners, developers, facility management companies"}]}
